ygData.subject: Rez changed
ygData.msgSnippet: I read on another e-mail list that on the test server they have done it once again and they are now changing rez spells.  This is what I ve read. Corpses that
ygData.messageBody:
I read on another e-mail list that on the test server they have done it once
again and they are now changing rez spells. This is what I've read.

Corpses that are older than 2 hours cannot be resurrected.
Corpses that are produced from a duel cannot be resurrected after 10
minutes.

I wish Verant would just leave things alone and fix the things that need
fixed like Plan of Fear, Rogues and things like that and stop making classes
weaker.

**************************
Azor Spellbound
Lvl 20 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************
